org.lightningj.paywall.keymgmt

Class DefaultFileKeyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.keymgmt.FileKeyManager
      • org.lightningj.paywall.keymgmt.DefaultFileKeyManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsymmetricKeyManager, KeyManager, SymmetricKeyManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpringDefaultFileKeyManager

    public abstract class DefaultFileKeyManager
extends FileKeyManager
implements AsymmetricKeyManager, SymmetricKeyManager
    Asymmetric and Symmetric File Key Manager using a RSA 2048 but key stored on disk on a specified location. Created by Philip Vendil on 2018-09-17.

      • getAsymTrustStorePath

        protected abstract java.lang.String getAsymTrustStorePath()
                                                   throws InternalErrorException
        Returns the path of directory where trusted public key files are stored.
        Returns:
        the path to the directory where trusted public key store files are stored. Or null if not configured.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if internal error occurred retrieving the trust store path.
